Subject: Configuration of AD Activity Collection in Netwrix Enterprise Auditor
Description:
Licensed for AD Activity in Netwrix Enterprise Auditor, but it was never configured.
Implementation was migrated over to new environment from an old deployment
We added the 6.Activity job group to the AD job group, during a meeting for ticket 00434204, but this has not yet been configured.
What_We_Know__c:
split from ticket 00434204

NAM does not have any DCs added - only FS
Also licensed for NTP AD
-need to check if they are actively auding AD with NTP
Next_Steps__c:
Meet with client
-confirm if NTP is auditing AD activity
-Deploy NAM agents on DCs
-Configure NTP for AD activity and forwarding to NAM agents
Solution_Comment__c:
Configured AD activity collection in NEA

Restored operation of NTP agents
Configured NTM for AD policy to send to NAM agents
Deployed NAM agents to DCs
Configured archiving of AD activity
-couldn't get API working due to environmental issue
Configured NEA to collect AD activity
